BNC User Reference Guide

<pp>

pp supplies page numbers for a bibliographic citation.
Class model.biblPart
Declaration 
element pp { macro.phraseSeq }
Attributes
(Global attributes and those inherited from [model.biblPart ] )
Example
 <bibl
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <title>Misfortunes of Nigel. </title> ... <pp>67-173</pp>
 </bibl>
Module module-from-bncxml
